meta.description: Digital identity tools for government agencies. Design, test, and deploy modern digital credentials according to global standards.

hero.title: Digital identity aligned with global standards
hero.description: Tools for governments to design, test and deploy modern digital credentials, with a secure sandbox that mirrors real European digital ID flows and lets you explore demo documents, verify QR codes and see exactly what information is shared.

overview.title: Modern infrastructure for national digital identity
overview.description: Support secure authentication and mobile credentials for public services.

features.title: Built on trusted digital identity foundations
features.description: Provide citizens with secure, modern and interoperable digital credentials that follow global standards and work across identity systems. Designed for national-scale programs with a focus on security, privacy and real-world usability.

standards.title: Standards & compliance
standards.description: Aligned with EUDI Wallet, ISO mobile driving licence and Verifiable Credentials specifications to ensure compatibility, interoperability and long-term reliability across public services.

issuance.title: Issuing & verification
issuance.description: Support secure issuance of IDs, permits and certificates with cryptographic validation, QR and barcode scanning, and offline-ready verification for real-world environments.

presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.description: Enable privacy-focused identity sharing with minimal disclosure, clear user consent and secure channels that ensure citizens control their data at every step.

caseStudy.title: Real results at national scale
caseStudy.description: How Albania enabled secure remote voter registration for its diaspora with Folio's digital identity wallet.

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.description: Albania needed a secure way for more than 1.6M citizens living abroad to register to vote remotely, while meeting strict security and transparency requirements.

solution.title: Solution
solution.description: The Central Election Commission launched a remote registration platform powered by Folio: mobile and web channels with secure identity verification and a digital voter card that shows application status.

participation.description: increase in diaspora participation vs previous election

profiles.description: profiles created across mobile and web channels
